title: Remove endorsement initialization from TribeType constructions
description: Edit `src/backend/app/graphql/types/tribe.py` to remove all instances of `_endorsements=[]` when constructing `UserType` objects. This ensures TribeType can still create UserType instances without endorsement data.
acceptance_criteria:
- No `_endorsements=[]` parameter in any UserType constructions in tribe.py
- TribeType compiles successfully
- Tribe queries return valid data with user objects
